resources.string: Get Started
To send and receive coins, you need an address (or \"key\") in your wallet. You can create a new key, or import an existing one.
Create New Key
Card Needed
Card *Containing Keys To Copy* Needed
Card *To Save Keys On To* Needed
Please hold your card against the device to continue.
Please tap the card that *contains the keys you wish to copy*.
Please tap the card that *you wish to copy the keys on to*.

The connection to your card was lost. Please move it away from your handheld device and tap it again. If you see this message frequently, you may have to reposition where you hold the card relative to the handheld device.
Tap Once More
Please remove your card and tap it once more to the device to finish.
Password Needed
Password Needed For Card Containing Keys To Copy
Password Needed For Card *To Save Keys On To*
Please enter the card\'s password.
Please enter the password for the card that *contains the keys you wish to copy*.
Please enter the password for the card that *you wish to copy the keys on to*.
To determine how many password attempts are left, tap the card to the phone now. If this is the last attempt, entering the wrong password will erase all data on the card.
You have %1$d password attempts left.
WARNING: This is your last password attempt. Entering the password wrong will erase all data on the card.
Generate New Key On Card
You have chosen to generate a new key on the card. Please enter a label for the key to be generated.
My Key
Error: you cannot have an empty label.
Error: you have entered in the wrong password.
Error: there is no more space left on the card.
Error: communication error with the card. You may not be positioning the card properly against the phone.
Error: an unknown error has occurred while communication with the card.
The key already exists on the card.
The card was wiped due to too many incorrect password attempts.
Enable NFC Radio
Please turn on your device\'s NFC radio and try this operation again. Press OK to be brought to the NFC settings screen.
Your device\'s NFC radio is off. You will not be able to perform certain operations with the card. Press OK to be brought to the NFC settings screen.
Your password was successfully changed.

Keys were successfully restored to card %2$s. Please review the list of keys on the card below. Please note that your wallet is currently tracking card %1$s. If you would like the wallet to switch to tracking the new card, tap it again.
Successfully Restored Keys

Your wallet is currently tracking card %1$s, but you have tapped card %2$s. If you would like the wallet to switch to tracking the new card, tap it again. Or, if you would like to copy keys between cards or to/from files, click the button below.
Card %1$s contains no keys.
Card %1$s contains the following keys:
New Card Detected
You should backup your keys in case your card is lost or damaged. You can copy keys from one card to another card or to a file, or restore keys from a file.
Backup or Restore Keys
Copy Keys From One Card To Another Card or to a File
Restore Keys From a File To a Card
This card contains no keys to backup.
Choose Keys To Backup
Label: %1$s\nAddress: %2$s
Save Keys
To save the keys to another card, please tap the other card now. Or, to save the keys to a file, please make the appropriate choice below.
Please tap the card to save the keys on to.
Save to File
Error: no password was entered.
Password to encrypt file against
Error: you tapped the same card that contains the keys you are backing up. Please tap a different card.
Successfully backed up keys to new card.
Error: this card does not have a password set.
The wallet needs to resynchronize with the blockchain. This may take some time. During this time, the balance shown may not be correct.
